decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s): 02-100 (Site Location Plan, Block Plan and Aerial View), 02-101 (Existing Ground Floor Plan), 02-102 (Existing First Floor Plan), 02-103 (Existing Second Floor Plan), 02-104 (Existing Roof Plan), 02-105 (Existing North and South Elevations), 02-106 (Existing East and West Elevations), 02-107 (Proposed Ground Floor Plan), 02-108 (Proposed First Floor Plan), 02-109 (Proposed Second Floor Plan), 02-110 (Proposed Roof Plan), 02-111 (Proposed North and South Elevations), 02-112 (Proposed East and West Elevations), 02-113 (Proposed Section A-A), 02-114 (Proposed 3D View), SSQ Del Carmen roofing slate specification, Gliderol Insulated Roller Door specification.

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning. | The hereby approved development shall use external materials as per the submitted application form or approved drawings and supporting documents (Red bricks, Deep blue-black slate, Insulated Aluminium Roller Door with Mahogany woodgrain textured finish).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4, 7B & 7C of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies HC1, D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021), the National Planning Policy Framework (2021) - section 16 and the St Stephens Conservation Area Management Plan (2007).
description: Alteration of existing garage roof and installation of a new roller shutter door
